meanings.definition: A person who supports or promotes a cause or idea.
meanings.sent1: The espousers of animal rights organized a peaceful protest.
meanings.sent2: The espousers of environmental conservation work tirelessly to protect our planet.
meanings.sent3: The espousers of recycling had a bin for every type of material in their homes.
meanings.sent4: She was the espouser of kindness, always spreading positivity wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The espousers of equality fought for fairness and justice for all.

meanings.definition: Those who advocate for or defend a particular belief or position.
meanings.sent1: The espousers of free speech stood up for the right to express opinions.
meanings.sent2: Political espousers often engage in debates to defend their viewpoints.
meanings.sent3: The espousers of chocolate as a health food had a sweet tooth for research.
meanings.sent4: She was the espouser of laughter, always finding humor in every situation.
meanings.sent5: The espousers of creativity encouraged others to think outside the box.
